update cvterm cv INNER JOIN cvterm cv1 ON cv.cvterm_id = cv1.cvterm_id set cv.is_system = 1 where cv1.cvterm_id in (1725,1726,8135,8150,8155,8165,8170,8190,8200,8201,8210,8220,8230, 8240,8250,8255,8300,8330,8350,8377,8400,8410,8411,8412,8413,8581,8582);
update cvterm cv INNER JOIN cvterm cv1 ON cv.cvterm_id = cv1.cvterm_id set cv.is_system = 1 where cv1.cv_id = 1040 and cv1.is_obsolete = 0 and cv1.name in ('PLOT_NUMBER_AP_text','INSTANCE_NUMBER_AP_text','REP_NUMBER_AP_text', 'PLANT_NUMBER_AP_text','PLOTCODE_AP_text');
